interaction_summary:

Product Title: Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box
Review Date: 2022/01/18
Store: Colourpop
Product Description: ['Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Brand': 'Colourpop', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '4.92 x 4.45 x 0.63 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are HUGE! Had to get this to go with my palette! It's a peachy / gold, and arrived in pretty good shape... the pan, as  as the mirror is HUGE! It's really light weight too,  which is why I took off a star.. it was also slightly cracked on the edge,too, but I am going to use it, so that's fine... Great Formula! Amazing Brand!
Review Title: Adorable!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Too Faced x Kat Von D ~ Better Together Ultimate Eye Collection ~ Limited Edition

I love this set!! A full sized liner, and a Too Faced Better than Sex full sized. The colors are gorgeous. Kats "devotion" is a highly pigmented black!! Great for lining as well...I have the whole collection, and I almost let this by , but the deal was great!!! Recommended!
Great Sex!! Great Value!!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Preferences:**
- Continues to favor high-quality makeup products, particularly eye cosmetics, while also exploring vibrant lip products.
- Enjoys collections that provide value, such as full-sized items, and is open to trying new products like highlighters that complement existing palettes.
- Shows a strong affinity for vibrant, pigmented colors in all makeup categories, including bold shades for lips, eyes, and now highlighters.
- Maintains a preference for respected cosmetic brands, valuing their quality and consistent positive experiences.

**Patterns:**
- Remains enthusiastic about limited edition or special collaboration collections, demonstrating an appreciation for unique items.
- Rates most products positively, commonly around 4 to 5 stars, recently giving a solid rating for a highlighter, reflecting satisfaction with the product notwithstanding minor issues.
- Engages in brand promotions and values deals, emphasizing a budget-conscious approach in their purchasing behavior.
- Likely an informed consumer staying abreast of beauty trends and recommendations, expressing excitement about product features and quality.

Overall, this user is a dedicated makeup enthusiast focused on quality, value, and vibrant pigmentation across both eye and lip cosmetics, expanding their collection with highlighters and embracing unique shades and formulas.
